Event.name: Fire_end_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>This scenario begins with a <fen>Fire</fen> burning, transitions as the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out, and ends with the <fen>Fire</fen> dissipated.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fire</fen> goes out.</def-root>

Arg.name: Fire
Arg.definition: <def-root>The combustion process that is coming to an end.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE describes the how near the <fen>Fire</fen> is to going out. </def-root>
